BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: PHILA HOSPITAL AND HEALTH CARE DISTRICT

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THE TRAINING AND UPGRADING FUND (THE FUND) IS TO ADDRESS THE WORKFORCE NEEDS OF HOSPITALS, NURSING HOMES, BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SETTINGS, HEALTH CLINICS AND SIMILAR INSTITUTIONS; AND DEVELOP TRAINING AND EDUCATION PROGRAMS FOR EMPLOYEES AND EMPLOYERS OF CONTRIBUTING INSTITUTIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THE TRAINING AND UPGRADING FUND (THE FUND) IS TO ADDRESS THE WORKFORCE NEEDS OF HOSPITALS, NURSING HOMES, BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SETTINGS, HEALTH CLINICS AND SIMILAR INSTITUTIONS; AND DEVELOP TRAINING AND EDUCATION PROGRAMS FOR EMPLOYEES AND EMPLOYERS OF CONTRIBUTING INSTITUTIONS.
IRS990.Desc: THE PURPOSE OF THE TRAINING AND UPGRADING FUND (THE FUND) IS TO ADDRESS THE WORKFORCE NEEDS OF HOSPITALS, NURSING HOMES, BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SETTINGS, HEALTH CLINICS AND SIMILAR INSTITUTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE FUND MANAGEMENT TO EVALUATE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE FUND AND RECOGNIZE A TAX LIABILITY IF THE FUND HAS TAKEN AN UNCERTAIN POSITION THAT, MORE LIKELY THAN NOT, WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE U.S. FEDERAL, STATE, OR LOCAL TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE FUND IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS. TYPICALLY, FUND TAX YEARS WILL REMAIN OPEN FOR THREE YEARS; HOWEVER, THIS MAY DIFFER DEPENDING UPON THE CIRCUMSTANCES OF THE FUND.
THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE THROUGH SERVICE CONTRACTS FROM A GOVERNMENTAL AGENCY.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: PWI- VOCATIONAL SKILLS TRAINING - NURSE AIDE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HALF OF THE TRUSTEES ARE APPOINTED BY DISTRICT 1199C HOSPITAL & HEALTH CARE EMPLOYEES UNION AND HALF ARE APPOINTED BY EMPLOYERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DISTRICT 1199C TRAINING AND UPGRADING FUND'S FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY ITS INDEPENDENT PUBLIC ACCOUNTANT WHO THEN FORWARDS THE COMPLETED RETURN TO EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CONTROLLER PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY IS REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE, ANNUALLY, ANY INTEREST THAT MAY GIVE RISE TO THE TRUST. THE ORGANIZATION MONITORS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY INQUIRING OF THE BOARD MEMBERS AT THE QUARTERLY MEETINGS WITH INDEPENDENT COUNSEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AS PART OF APPROVAL AND MONITORING OF ANNUAL BUDGET, SALARIES OF KEY EMPLOYEES ARE SET BY THE BOARD WITH APPROPRIATE COMPARISONS TO SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DISTRICT 1199C TRAINING AND UPGRADING FUND'S ORGANIZING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII CONTACT ADDRESSES FOR OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, ETC
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MARK S. MUNGAN - 1 MEDICAL CENTER BLVD., UPLAND, PA 19013. CHERYL WHITFIELD - 2600 BELMONT AVE., PHILADELPHIA, PA 19131. JOHN LASKY - 3401 N. BROAD STREET, PHILADELPHIA, PA 19140. SUSAN SHAFFER - 132 SOUTH 10TH STREET, PHILADELPHIA, PA 19107.

THE DISTRICT 1199C TRAINING AND UPGRADING FUND'S GOVERNING BODY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSEEING THE AUDIT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT THAT PERFORMS THE AUDIT.
PHILADELPHIA HOSPITAL AND HEALTH CARE RECEIVES GRANTS, BOTH DIRECTLY AND INDIRECTLY AS A SUB-GRANTEE, FROM THE GOVERMENTAL AND PRIVATE ORGANIZATIONS LISTED ON SCHEDULE B.
